TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RibbonPositionType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 Microsoft Office 菜单上控件的位置、内置选项卡上控件组的位置或者内置选项卡或自定义选项卡中选项卡的位置。

span.span: Specifies the position of a control on the Microsoft Office Menu, a group of controls on a built-in tab, or a tab among built-in or custom tabs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值由指定功能区元素相对于其他元素的位置。The value of is used by to specify the position of a Ribbon element in relation to other elements. 可以使用将自定义组上的内置选项卡移动到某个位置。有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 自定义内置选项卡](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-customize-a-built-in-tab)。You can use the to move a custom group into a certain position on a built-in tab. For more information, see [How to: Customize a Built-in Tab](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-customize-a-built-in-tab). 可以使用移动相对于其他 Microsoft Office 菜单上的控件的自定义控件。You can use the to move custom controls in relation to other controls on the Microsoft Office Menu. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将控件添加到 Backstage 视图](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view)。For more information, see [How to: Add Controls to the Backstage View](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view). 若要指定特定的内置元素，请使用。To specify a particular built-in element, use the . 在 Microsoft 下载中心网站页上提供了 Office ID 值的列表[Office 2010 帮助文件： Office Fluent 用户界面控件标识符](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052)。A list of Office ID values is available at the Microsoft Download Center Web page [Office 2010 Help Files: Office Fluent User Interface Control Identifiers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionType AfterOfficeId = int32(2)

summary.span: 将控件放在内置控件之后。

span.span: Put your control after a built-in control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionType BeforeOfficeId = int32(1)

summary.span: 将控件放在内置控件之前。

span.span: Put your control before a built-in control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionType Default = int32(0)

summary.span: 将控件放在最后，在 Microsoft Office 菜单、选项卡或功能区末尾。

span.span: Put your control last, at the end of the Microsoft Office Menu, tab, or Ribbon.

summary.span: 按钮和组显示在所有现有按钮和组之后。

span.span: Buttons and groups appear after all of the existing buttons and groups.

summary.span: 自定义选项卡添加到选项卡列表末尾。

span.span: Custom tabs are added to the end of the tabs list.
